page.title: 10RECREATION
page.content: Kingsnorth run a cricket club and football in the winter. South Ashford has a Youth Centre and a Youth Wing attached to a Secondary School. Football clubs operate for adults and youngsters. Whilst the Stour Centre is not based in our 'block', many children and adults attend for a multiplicity of indoor sports _ squash, badminton, soccer, volleyball, weight lifting, etc. A swimming pool is the main attraction. During School holidays arrangements are made to enable youngsters to experience the whole range. Local firms operate midday leagues and encourage employees to participate. A Cactus Society and two Gardening groups operate. Fishing takes place in local streams and ponds.
